title: Modern House For Sale
details:
Architect designed Modern, * 03 B/Rooms
* Master B/Room with A/C,
*02 Wash Rooms, * Hot / Cold Water, *Maid Toilet,
* Shower Cubicle. * Fully Tiled,
* Built -in Wall Cupboards in Rooms,
* Car Porch, * Boundary Wall with Security fencing
* 10 perch land. 1800 Sq.Ft. Quiet residential area close to the Railway station, Churches and schools
(De Mazenod & OKI International) located at Boy’s Town Road, Hapugoda, Kandana.
* Solidly built .
* Inspection by appointment.
* Local Authority Docs in order .
* Contact: J.Perera - 0776088086
* Selling Price – 10 M. (Negotiable after inspection)
